summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons administrative forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated August 1, 2019. It includes a count sheet, an inmate roster, and official count slips, which are routine prison records for tracking inmate population and location. The roster lists one inmate, Jeffrey Epstein, who is noted with a 'SUICIDE OR UNASSG' assignment code.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as inmate 85918-054 on the MCC inmate roster with an assignment code of 'SUICIDE OR UNASSG'.

events.title: Daily Prison Count at MCC New York
events.description: Routine administrative count of inmates at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, showing a total census of 763 inmates.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC), New York, NY
keyFacts: This document is dated August 1, 2019, the day before Jeffrey Epstein's death.
Jeffrey Epstein is listed as inmate 85918-054 with an assignment code of 'SUICIDE OR UNASSG' (Suicide or Unassigned).
The total inmate census for the MCC New York on this date was 763.
The document consists of standard prison administrative forms for tracking inmate counts and assignments.
The forms include a count sheet, an inmate roster, and official count slips, indicating routine prison operations.
